website_summaries.verdict: Double-bowl sink that's available in choice of finishes to fit just about any kitchen style.
pros: Made of durable, granite-based patented material
Dual-sink design is practical and available in several attractive colors
cons: Some sinks arrived damaged and wrapped in subpar packaging

customer_reviews.title: Question regarding what to clean the sink with.
customer_reviews.text: What is the best product for cleaning the sink? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Best sink ever
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I'd like this sink when I bought it two years ago. But I think it's one of my favorite parts of my remodeled kitchen! The deep left bowl is so helpful for rinsing vegetables, soaking pots, or anything else. It's not a smooth finish but still cleans up great. I have a dish drainer over the right side permanently and no issues. Love the sink!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Buyer we aware.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Ours is 4 years old and it’s disgusting, it’s stained and chipped. I would understand the wear and tear if we had a large family but it’s just my husband and I. Additionally, we use our dial washer regularly. Look at other more durable sinks - porcelain or stainless steel. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous! So happy with this sink. Would buy again. Sure is refreshing to change from white to this for our remodeled kitchen. First sink arrived with chips on 3 corners, small chunk missing from one corner. Immediately initiated pickup/replacement. The replacement arrived in 2 additional days in PERFECT CONDITION. I am a good customer with Amazon and stuff happens. They immediately made it right which is why i will continue to shop with them. Thank you Amazon. Couldn't be happier with my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Holly R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love my sink
customer_reviews.text: I love my sink!!! Remodeled my kitchen and use this under mount with my granite. It is fabulous. I have received many compliments on this sink. Price was great. Delivery was fast and packaged well. Have used this for approximately 4 years now and it looks new. It has received a great deal of use in this amount of time. I have recommended to others and will continue to. Will buy again if in the market for another
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sink
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived two days after ordering and was undamaged. Price was a shy less than half of a local dealer. Why would anyone wishing to have a sink like this not order this?? Have absolutely no idea what its 'stain resistance or easy to clean' features are. Has yet to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Scott Sue SCott

customer_reviews.title: Blanco colored sinks (brown, black, etc.) undermount or top mount are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my old Blanco sink...so when I need to select a new sink to go with our brand new granite countertops, it was a no-brainer to go back to a Blanco sink with matching color of our Brown Pearl II granite! It was a perfect complement and I'm thrilled to have found a perfect match that was NOT stainless steel color! Love this Brown Blanco Undermount sink! Very happy with this purchase...would do it again in a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen sink!
customer_reviews.text: This a great silgranite sink with nice curved back sides. A little deeper than I wanted but this is the only 1 3/4 bowl model in this line. It looks great in my kitchen and the anthracite is much better than a standard black. doesn't show dirt, cleans easily and seems very tough. I also got the matching baskets. After over two years of use, it looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Sedona Bert

customer_reviews.title: Love our new Blanco Silgrant II sink
customer_reviews.text: We have used this sink or about a month. So far it has been easy to clean and we have had no issues. I did NOT purchase the very expensive sink racks and can think of no real advantage to owning them. The under-mount has been very nice when wiping off the counters. The larger sink is very deep and works good for larger items. It is quite a drop for the water from the faucet, so beware of some splashing. My remedy is to lower the pull-out of the faucet to the preferred level.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love the color BUT came cracked
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing, it is even better than I pictured. When it was getting installed by the countertop company, they noticed a hair line fracture on the upper part where the sink divider is. I am still pending a response from the company Blanco. Our countertop professional said Blanco is very good at sending replacements. Once this happens, I would give it a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Easy to clean. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just installed as undermount w/ granite last week and it's beautiful. Very easy to clean and classic addition to upgraded kitchen. Much lighter than porcelain sink. Ordered black throat and baskets from H.D., and it all looks Amazing
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for a sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is perfect! Nice finish, nice color, durable. We added the Blanco protective wire racks to help protect the bottoms and make it easy to dry dishes right in the sink. The wire racks are expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Watts

customer_reviews.title: looks terrible. Would never buy again
customer_reviews.text: We are very unhappy with this sink. Does not clean well, stains are hard to clean. The basket paint chips off, looks terrible. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MEEDA

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a winner
customer_reviews.text: A great sink at an excellent price, so far. Just was delivered last night. Got it from South Shore. It's going to be a perfect match for the new Crema Bordeaux granite. It's not just black It looks like it's faintly speckeled with gray throughout. You really have to see it to appreciate how it looks. We'd looked at LOTS of other sinks but this really works with the granite. We'll see how it holds up after it's installed.
customer_reviews.author: The Chef

customer_reviews.title: Cracked sink.
customer_reviews.text: The sink came loose in the box. When our counter person went cut the granite for it, he informed us the sink had 3 cracks. There was no packing for the sink, just sat in a big box.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Amstutz

customer_reviews.title: While the product is beautiful it was cracked when it arrived (cracked in two ...
customer_reviews.text: While the product is beautiful it was cracked when it arrived (cracked in two spots). Our contractor indicated they often see those cracks in the exact same spot on the Blanco granite sinks (basically where the bowls are divided, one crack is at the top of the sink and one at the bottom). This seems to indicate the product is defective if the same cracks show up repeatedly. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blanco Black sink
customer_reviews.text: Found this in our local granite shop when we were looking for new counter tops. They sent me to the website to look at different options so I went to Amazon to look and found this great priced sink. Called the shop to price match and they said they couldnt match/beat the great prices so ordered it here. Awesome sink, arrived in a HUGE box, double and triple wrapped for protection. Saved ourselves over 120+ dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, unique product makes your kitchen stand out
customer_reviews.text: Installed this undermount granite sink with new granite countertops. Looks great. Blanco has a selection of colors, so you can match your granite. After more than a year, it is holding up beautifully. Easy to clean with Soft Scrub. Delivery was quick. Remember to order the matching inserts for the drains, depending on whether you have a disposal on one side or not. (Check out items 441321 and 441323 if you order the Biscotti color, comparable items if you order a different color.) With all the upgrading of kitchens now-a-days, people are still surprised and impressed by a granite sink.
customer_reviews.author: mochanut

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: Poor support from vendor. Lots of complaints about cracks in this batch, so they took it off the market. they were quick to take it back, but I was left with nothing.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: It has taken a while to install the sink. It looks great and the installer of the countertops had no problem installing.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Risky to ship - probably better to purchase locally
customer_reviews.text: Box had no significant visible damage, but sink was in at least 5 pieces when it arrived. Split between the sinks and large chunks broken off. Returning . . . .
customer_reviews.author: TBP Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink at a great price. Bought two in truffle color, one for me and one for my daughter. Packaging was excellent and they arrived quickly in good condition. So easy and convenient to have drop-shipped to our installer. I saved almost $360 on the two sinks compared to buying from plumbing supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mary

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this Blanco sink!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly and was well packaged to prevent breakage. We had it professionally installed by the same company that did our granite counters and it is a perfect fit. We did our own plumbing and both the garbage disposal and the regular pipes installed easily. I had thought that I would have less room under my sink cupboard, but it actually turns out I have MORE! I love having the larger/deeper and smaller/shallower sinks, and I love the look and color, and ease of care of this Blanco sink. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauneen Washburn

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sink from Amazon and was a little nervous about it being shipped (afraid that it might break or chip), but it was packed so incredibly well that it arrived in perfect condition. This sink is absolutely awesome. I had read previous reviews, most of which were good, so decided to purchase this sink. This dark color goes great with my new granite, really setting off the veins in the stone. It doesn't water spot, and is incredibly easy to keep clean. And what an updated look it provides! I think that anyone considering purchasing a silgranit sink would be thrilled with this one.....I know that I am.
customer_reviews.author: lovetocook

customer_reviews.title: Chipping sink
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sink a little over a year now and sad to say I am now getting a few chips in the disposal side. Very ,very upsetting . I would love to know if there was any warranty info on the sink itself or not. I should've known better when the first sink came cracked that this was not the sink for the new remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water spots/stains after 1 week!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sink installed for a week and already there are water stains all over the bottom of it that won't come off. Even though it guarantees stain resistant, I can't even find a number to contact about. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Elizabeth Cook

customer_reviews.title: What a sink
customer_reviews.text: VERY LARGE... really like that I can soak and wash ANY of my large items. Install was great (i didnt do it). looks very elegant. I had an imperfection (small hole in the sink, not all the way through though), but Amazon was quick to compensate me for the issue. Love this sink. didnt need the extra disposal stopper because the disposal we bought came with one. cheaper than anywhere else and shipping was quick and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. DeNova

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I live this sink! It arrived in tact and was just what I hoped it would be! So thankful to have it and would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E

customer_reviews.title: BEST SINK EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for some time before deciding on this sink. The debate was between a stainless steel sink or this one. We had previously had a white cast iron sink, so I knew I didn't want to do that. I am so happy I purchased this! It looks fabulous, cleans well, does not show marks, and the bowl fits large items. I have stoneware items and used to cringe when I wanted to clean them in the cast iron sink because I knew it would scratch. Not so with this sink. If you're on the fence, you will NOT be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Love my blanco cafe brown sink
customer_reviews.text: Love my blanco cafe brown sink! I was worried it would be too big to fit but it looks great. Just know if you have standard size cabinet (mines 25" deep) that the faucet and other granite drill holes need to be to the right by the slightly smaller bowl. I cant speak for the longevity cause ive only had it 5 days, but it is beautiful, especially with light granite and oil rubbed bronze fixtures. 2 day shipping is amazing also as the local plumbing retailers in milwaukee said 2-4 weeks for shipping. Make sure you get the matching strainers. Very happy so far with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nurse nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from Stainless to this sink. My wife loves it and we use the Blanco sink cleaner as recommended. We've had no issues of staining or scratching and it looks great with our granite. They really package the sink well for shipping as it comes in an oversized box stuffed with rigid styrofoam. We are very pleased with our purchase and the great price!
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink. Biscotti blends perfectly with the granite counter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Biscotti blends perfectly with the granite counter tops. Sink is really deep and much wider than my old sink. Much easier to keep looking it's best - had stainless before. Like the 60/40 split. Did have to move the drain pipes back for the installation. Have had many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C

customer_reviews.title: Best sink ever
customer_reviews.text: I live this sink. It’s so deep and not to mention so good looking compared to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love doing dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Best sink ever! Love the color, size and depth! I ❤️❤️❤️❤️It and will never go back to any other kind!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hollier

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Product
customer_reviews.text: We were redoing our Kitchen and hate the tinney sound of stainless steel sinks. This is a solid design, appears to withstand our cooking spills without staining, and it of solid construction. We purchased the stainless steele inserts for each side to extend the looks and life of the product. I would not have any hesitation purchasing another product like this from this company.
customer_reviews.author: K. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Top sink for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sink...installed over 100 of these. Still looks new after 10 years. Don't buy the Blanco sink cleaner..junk. Use a MR. CLEAN magic eraser cleaner, then seal with a stone/granite sealer....do this every six months and it will always look new!! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: TheNorthFace

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this sink!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sink. It is absolutely gorgeous! We just remodeled our kitchen and I used it with Tan/Brown Granite...it is beautiful. I have had many compliments on this sink. Thank you. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: carlaktdot

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful with my dark brown granite. I had it professionally installed, so I can't say if it was easy or not. It cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. Very pleased with it. Looks great with new granite countertops. I went with the 1 and 3/4 design as a salesperson in one store said she liked to be able to put a dish drying rack in the small size. I agree and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best sink ever! Matte finish and scratch resistant love the black instead of stainless
customer_reviews.author: Missy Bratt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sink
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink. It looks great under mounted. It does take some cleaning though. No stains yet, but we have the white color and we've had to scrub some grey build up off at times. Overall... happy with the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: High Recomended
customer_reviews.text: I'm a contractor and I install Silgranit sinks on the majority of my project. Stainless scratches easy and looks old within a year. Silgranit remains its new luster for years.
customer_reviews.author: TimL

customer_reviews.title: Last Sink - Best Sink Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this sink. I even look forward to doing dishes ha ha!!! You will be very happy with a Blanco, I Am 💜👍🏻🎉👊🏻👏🏻💪🏻🙌🏻🌻
customer_reviews.author: KFloves2read

customer_reviews.title: High quality beautiful sink for $200 less than buying exact same sink ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality beautiful sink for $200 less than buying exact same sink in a store. Color was true to the sample I'd viewed in a plumbing supply store. It compliments my new Quartz countertops wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Bogie

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. It's very easy to clean and is nice and deep for cleaning cookie sheets or large objects.
customer_reviews.author: Aray

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! The extra deep sink is great for washing or soaking big pots!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Spitz

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This sink sets off my new kitchen and is so classy AND functional. Had it about two months now and have used recommendations from the other reviews and used a little baby oil on a soft cloth to clean it -- works great! Highly recommended : )
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Glasshagel

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Have had the sink for about a month now and its been great. Was a little worried at first with some of the reviews but i think some of the bad reviews may be review the incorrect product. The silgranit product is excellent. We have had many compliments on the sink already. No issue with cleaning or stains of any kind. I highly reccomend this sink just make sure its a silgranit II and you will be as happy as we are with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. Gressler

customer_reviews.title: This granite composite sink is fantastic. The 60/40 split makes it much easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: This granite composite sink is fantastic. The 60/40 split makes it much easier to use and it is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Punky

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sink when i remodeled the kitchen and had granite countertops installed. Black finish is a nice compliment to the granite i selected. Had the sink and new faucet professionally installed and there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sink
customer_reviews.text: This Blanco Silgranit sink has been installed into a new remodel for two weeks as of this writing. So far it's an excellent product. Looks great in our granite counter, easy to keep clean and the bowls are the perfect size. As usual with Amazon, it arrived just a day or two after we ordered it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. James

customer_reviews.title: best sink ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sink. We have 3 of these in our home and they are amazing! 1. They clean up so easily. 2. They don't scratch. They won't stain. 3. They even look better after you have used them. The granite starts to come out and gives it a nice granite look.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great choice with granite counter tops
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice to have a sink that looks great and doesn't stain or scratch. We had an older Swanstone sink before and it was constantly in need of bleaching and scrubbing because it stained so easily. This Blanko sink is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Bjerning

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this sink! Color choices are great, does not stain, easy to maintain. Looks awesome with my granite.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Zaback

customer_reviews.title: PRompt service
customer_reviews.text: The sink is beautiful and perfect and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: James Long

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This granite sink is amazing! Been in use for a month now and it lives up to all the raves. No scratching, easy clean up! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, delivered perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered this in a very sturdy box. It was in great condition. The sink is very deep and may not fit all cabinets. I love the color and it cleans up beautifully. I can fit a big cassorole dish in the larger side. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CJN

customer_reviews.title: Looks like crap and German manufacturer stopped making Silgranit cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product chips and stains over time. Looks like crap and German manufacturer stopped making Silgranit cleaner. It would not help though. Don't buy this product. It will not stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: patricia davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! Good quality and stylish. It completes any granite counter top rebuilding project.
customer_reviews.author: Packdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is not only beautiful, it's so easy to clean and keep clean! Would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sink installed for the last three years and it still looks like the day I installed it. We also got the grates for it which I suppose helps protect the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dorland

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent. Saw it at a friend's house. Amazon price was almost half that of local home supply store. The great benefit is that it does not show any scratches or dirt. Holds up extremely well to wear and heat. Very happy. Very easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Man from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful and matches our granite countertops perfectly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink replaced a stainless steel sink that was very hard to clean and showed every scrstch. The bowls in the new bBlanco are deeper and are a very good match with the new granite counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: John McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be starting to stain though.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, fast delivery, accurate description of what the produce is, this is the first time I purchased a product like this online if I need another one I would not hesitate to do it again
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to stainless steel again!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did Plumbing Depot ship it promptly upon receiving the order, but it was packed very well so no damage occurred, plus free S&H. We put a stainless steel sink in a remodeled kitchen of a house we ended up selling and I liked the way it looked - but it took work to keep it looking nice. In our new house we put in the Silgranit II sink in metallic gray and I love it! There is no work to it - it looks good all the time. I don't worry about scratching it like I did with the stainless sink, and I don't have to invest in the costly sink racks to protect the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: rubyslippers

customer_reviews.title: It makes a beautiful addition to our new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We installed our new Biscotti silgranit II sink during our remodel 2 years ago. It makes a beautiful addition to our new kitchen. I love the extra deep bowl. This sink is large so a side sprayer is a must! I was nervous about cleaning my new sink- but a little Barkeeper's Friend made it sparkle like new. It was quite an investment but well worth every penny. I don't have to worry about water spots or rusting. I love my new sink.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great pirce. Large and deep for wash pans. Never scratches or looks dirty. I had a granite composite sink before this one and it always gets comments when people see my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sibert

customer_reviews.title: ... sink and I cannot state enough how much I love it. It looks fabulous and is a joy ...
customer_reviews.text: Have just bought this sink and I cannot state enough how much I love it. It looks fabulous and is a joy to use. Never thought I would say that about a sink but it is. It arrived quickly and I thank Amazon for their efficiency. It is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: Was a little afraid of getting such a dark sink
customer_reviews.text: This anthracite sink goes beautifully with our new granite countertops. The granite has flecks of black in it that really make the sink look stunning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Macie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect.... Great quality and perfect color. If contemplating - buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sink
customer_reviews.text: Came right on time! It's a beautiful sink...a medium charcoal gray. Looks great with our new Verde Tunas granite.Have not used sink yet....but my friend with silgranit...would have nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: F. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Third times the charm! (first two arrived damaged.)
customer_reviews.text: Finally - the third sink shipped arrived with no visible cracks in it ! The sink is beautiful. Lets see what happens when the contractor installs it. Contractor installed. Sink is Beautiful.. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sink! Careful with the soap dispenser location when ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional sink! Careful with the soap dispenser location when installing. Ours did not end up on the deep well side. Need to be nimble to get under the sink to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Kim

customer_reviews.title: We just love this sink
customer_reviews.text: We just love this sink. It's hard to get the right adapters for the drains and disposal but such a nice part of our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: Blanco 60/40 anthracite sink
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this sink for the island in our new home. I absolutely love it. Turned out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It just arrived and looks in good condition
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It just arrived and looks in good condition. Will post again after its installed. It looks very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only description is Wow. The disposer makes much less noise as well.
customer_reviews.author: George Phalen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Durable & looks good
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Durable & looks good. Great match to the granite countertop. No downside.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: terrific sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink for anyone who loves to really cook. The elongated bowl on the left will fit my largest skillet. Very durable!! Never thought I'd prefer it over the good ol' fashioned enameled cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Betty S. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This made a great look and functions very well. Definitely a recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Massaro

customer_reviews.title: nice sink
customer_reviews.text: It's just too bad I had to return it!! My "countertop" guy said it was too big for my allotted spot for a sink..bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great color and durability
customer_reviews.text: Great color and durability. Using for 3 months and no problem at all. It does not get stained, easy to clean and it does not show water stains.
customer_reviews.author: ayse

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sink. Lots of space and great for cleanup . Would definitely recommend to anyone . Great choice of colors available .
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H. Doane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for my new house! It looks beautiful with the granite I picked and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kitcat78

customer_reviews.title: Blanco Sink
customer_reviews.text: Now installed, very happy with this item. As advertised, looks great now that it is installed in my new Corian Countertops.
customer_reviews.author: TedS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. Deep and wide. Blends in with solid surface countertop. Matte finish, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jvm

customer_reviews.title: COOL LOOKING SINK
customer_reviews.text: The black sink is very striking. The different size bowls (both size and depth) is also nice. The curves on the top edge breakup the rectangular look.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: This sink is great. The smaller side is large enough for a dinner dish to set in and the larger size is big enough for a pan to set in. Plus it's deep too. Easy to take care of and it doesn't scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sordel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with my Monte Cristo granite countertops. And oil rubbed bronze faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: The color was perfect with my colonial gold granite counter top
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect with my colonial gold granite counter top . The quality and size surpassed my expectations love it.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE NEZNIK

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already scratched.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the item for our house that is being built, we took delivery of it today and opened it up to inspect. We found that it had scratches and an area that appeared to be worn. Hard to rate the sink as it has not been installed yet, but if it arrives scratched it only makes you wonder what will happen once its installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...as a sink could be
customer_reviews.text: When refinishing my kitchen, I had my heart set on a composite sink and was thrilled to find this very reasonably priced on Amazon. My expectations were met. This sink is stylish and functional and perfectly compliments my kitchen decor. Scrapes and smudges from the installation rubbed right off.
customer_reviews.author: V. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Blanco Diamond Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Blanco BL440180 sink. Had one in our old house, and moved into the condo and put one in here. We love this sink, cleans well, and still looked good after years. We now bought the Blanco matching, fitting sink grids. It is an undermount with our granite countertops and is beautiful. Not Cheap, but see before.
customer_reviews.author: Red Devil

customer_reviews.title: I first bought this for my own kitchen remodel. ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this for my own kitchen remodel. Now I buy this sink for every home I remodel. It always gets rave reviews!!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Willis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! It has been installed and is working wonderfully! :o)
customer_reviews.author: Larry L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The sink was installed under mount with no issues and compliments the granite I chose for my kitchen. It cleans up easily with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the sink
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. Easy to clean, no worries about scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! Durable and really makes the kitchen look great!
customer_reviews.author: Fburg Gma

product_meta.title: BLANCO, Anthracite 440179 DIAMOND SILGRANIT 60/40 Double Bowl Undermount Kitchen Sink, 32" X 21"
product_meta.description:
Color:Anthracite FinishBoth an expression of your individual style, and a testament to BLANCO's unsurpassed quality and craftsmanship - a variety of shape, sizes and features combine to bring you the DIAMOND collection. Every detail has been considered, from the large bowl capacity to the easy-to-clean, durable SILGRANIT surface. The BLANCO DIAMOND 1-3/4 BOWL offers plenty of room for rinsing, washing, soaking, spraying and straining operations. Made from the rock hard, SILGRANIT patented surface, the DIAMOND kitchen sink features a smooth surface that is resistant to chips, scratches and heats up to 536°F. Even a fork or the bottom of a hot pan can't damage BLANCO SILGRANIT sinks. The colorful, non-porous surface also makes the bowl resistant from all stains, household acids and alkali solutions as well as easy-to-clean. For three generations, BLANCO has quietly and passionately elevated the standards for luxury sinks, faucets, and decorative accessories. A family-owned company, BLANCO was founded over 85 years ago in Germany, and recently celebrated a milestone of 25 years in the United States where we are recognized as a leader in quality, innovation, and unsurpassed service. Create the ideal kitchen experience with the versatility of the DIAMOND collection.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Silgranit withstands extreme hot and cold fluctuations and is a uniquely resilient material, less likely to break dinnerware and fine crystal. Softly rounded drain grooves serve as a point of elegance as well as function.
feature_bullets: SINK DIMENSIONS: 32" L X 21" W X 9.5" D and designed to fit a minimum 36" cabinet base
ULTRA-DURABLE PATENTED MATERIAL: Heat, scratch, stain, chip and impact-resistant while also 100% hygienic and food-friendly
OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES: Left grid (item #220998), right grid (item #231342) and floating dish rack (item #236431)
WARRANTY: Your BLANCO kitchen sink features a Limited Lifetime Warranty for added protection and complete peace of mind
INTERACTIVE DESIGN TOOL: Download the BLANCO SILGRANIT mobile color app to help coordinate your sink with common countertop stones or upload your own countertop and match your sink accordingly!
Easy under mount installation, includes mounting hardware
Withstands extreme hot and cold fluctuations
